title.narrative: World of Weaving- The beauty of handwoven 2

description.narrative: The project will select 10 women trainees to receive skills training for one year. All trainees will be youth. It is expected that after training they will have high chances of employment as the demand for woven products is growing fast. Whilst the weaving profession is growing in rural Tanzania there are very few weavers in urban areas. The raw material is far and there is poor knowledge of weaving techniques global designs and world markets. Target group is young people especially unemployed youth who hav e will and determination to learn skills and get employment. The beneficiaries will be trainees families communities and society at large. Mawazo Contemporary Art Centre is the main implementer of this project. This organization was selected based on its o bjective of enhancing professionalism and pride in the textile industry by bringing Tanzanian weaving designs to the world market and its the only organization among the applicants which had this unique idea.
